reason: The strong institutional backing for blockchain projects (OKX Ventures, UK/HSBC) signals growing confidence in the underlying technology and real-world asset tokenization, supporting a phase of accumulation. While a recent liquidation event indicates ongoing market volatility, these 'shake-outs' can often precede upward movements. However, the introduction of politically-linked platforms adds an unpredictable external layer of risk, warranting a cautious 'WATCH' stance to monitor for directional catalysts.
headlines: Binance not alone in seeing liquidations during Oct. 10 event, Binance CEO Teng says
OKX Ventures backs STBL in partnership with Hamilton Lane and Securitize
Trump-linked WLFI's Zak Folkman teases forex platform at Consensus Hong Kong
UK appoints HSBC for blockchain bond pilot
Cardano founder Charles Hoskinson says Midnight won't chase Monero, ZCash users
